info.title: Avalanche JSON-RPC
info.description:
This API lets you interact with an Avalanche client via JSON-RPC
 Use method tag to complete the url ex: https://api.avax.network/ext/vm/avm

methods.name: avm.buildGenesis
methods.summary: Given a JSON representation of this Virtual Machineâ€™s genesis state, create the byte representation of that state.

params.name: alias
params.description: alias X,P or C

methods.name: avm.getAllBalances
methods.summary: Get the balances of all assets controlled by a given address.

params.name: Address
params.description: X-chain address

methods.name: avm.getAssetDescription
methods.summary: Get information about an asset.

params.name: assetID
params.description: is the id of the asset for which the information is requested.

methods.name: avm.getBalance
methods.summary: Get information about an asset.

params.name: Address
params.description: owner of the asset

params.name: assetID
params.description: id of the asset for which the balance is requested.

methods.name: avm.getTx
methods.summary: Returns the specified transaction. The encoding parameter sets the format of the returned transaction. Can be either "cb58" or "hex". Defaults to "cb58".

methods.name: avm.getTxStatus
methods.summary: Gets a transactionâ€™s status by its ID. If the transaction was dropped, response will include a reason field with more information why the transaction was dropped.

result.name: getTxStatusResult
result.description:
status is one of:
 Validating: The blockchain is being validated by this node.
 Created: The blockchain exists but isnâ€™t being validated by this node.
 Preferred: The blockchain was proposed to be created and is likely to be created but the transaction isnâ€™t yet accepted.
 Unknown: The blockchain either wasnâ€™t proposed or the proposal to create it isnâ€™t preferred. The proposal may be resubmitted.

methods.name: avm.getUTXOs
methods.summary: Gets the UTXOs that reference a given address. If sourceChain is specified, then it will retrieve the atomic UTXOs exported from that chain to the X Chain.

params.name: limit
params.description: If startIndex is omitted, will fetch all UTXOs up to limit.

methods.name: avm.issueTx
methods.summary: Send a signed transaction to the network. encoding specifies the format of the signed transaction. Can be either "cb58" or "hex". Defaults to "cb58".

methods.name: platform.getBalance
methods.summary: Get the balance of AVAX controlled by a given address.

params.name: Address
params.description: P-chain address

balance.description: is the total balance, in nAVAX.

unlocked.description: is the unlocked balance, in nAVAX.

lockedStakeable.description: is the locked stakeable balance, in nAVAX.

lockedNotStakeable.description: is the locked and not stakeable balance, in nAVAX.

utxoIDs.description: are the IDs of the UTXOs that reference address.

methods.name: platform.getBlockchains
methods.summary: Get all the blockchains that exist (excluding the P-Chain).

schema.title: blockchains
schema.description: is all of the blockchains that exists on the Avalanche network.

name.description: is the human-readable name of this blockchain.

subnetID.description: is the ID of the Subnet that validates this blockchain.

vmID.description: is the ID of the Virtual Machine the blockchain runs.

methods.name: platform.getBlockchainStatus
methods.summary: Get the status of a blockchain.

result.name: getBlockchainStatusResult
result.description:
status is one of:
 Validating: The blockchain is being validated by this node.
 Created: The blockchain exists but isnâ€™t being validated by this node.
 Preferred: The blockchain was proposed to be created and is likely to be created but the transaction isnâ€™t yet accepted.
 Unknown: The blockchain either wasnâ€™t proposed or the proposal to create it isnâ€™t preferred. The proposal may be resubmitted.

methods.name: platform.getCurrentSupply
methods.summary: Returns an upper bound on the number of AVAX that exist. This is an upper bound because it does not account for burnt tokens, including transaction fees.

result.name: getCurrentSupplyResult
result.description: is an upper bound on the number of AVAX that exist, denominated in nAVAX.

methods.name: platform.getCurrentValidators
methods.summary: List the current validators of the given Subnet.

params.name: subnetID
params.description: is the subnet whose current validators are returned. If omitted, returns the current validators of the Primary Network.

params.name: nodeIDs
params.description: is a list of the nodeIDs of current validators to request. If omitted, all current validators are returned. If a specified nodeID is not in the set of current validators, it will not be included in the response.

startTime.description: s the Unix time when the validator starts validating the Subnet.

endTime.description: is the Unix time when the validator stops validating the Subnet.

stakeAmount.description: is the amount of nAVAX this validator staked. Omitted if subnetID is not the Primary Network

methods.name: platform.getHeight
methods.summary: Returns the height of the last accepted block.

methods.name: platform.getMinStake
methods.summary: Get the minimum amount of AVAX required to validate the Primary Network and the minimum amount of AVAX that can be delegated.

methods.name: platform.getPendingValidators
methods.summary: List the validators in the pending validator set of the specified Subnet. Each validator is not currently validating the Subnet but will in the future.

params.name: subnetID
params.description: is the subnet whose current validators are returned. If omitted, returns the current validators of the Primary Network.

params.name: nodeIDs
params.description: is a list of the nodeIDs of current validators to request. If omitted, all current validators are returned. If a specified nodeID is not in the set of current validators, it will not be included in the response.

methods.name: platform.getRewardUTXOs
methods.summary: Returns the UTXOs that were rewarded after the provided transaction's staking or delegation period ended.

params.name: txID
params.description: is the ID of the staking or delegating transaction.

methods.name: platform.getStakingAssetID
methods.summary: Retrieve an assetID for a subnetâ€™s staking asset. Currently, this only returns the Primary Networkâ€™s staking assetID.

params.name: subnetID
params.description: is the subnet whose assetID is requested.

params.name: assetID
params.description: is the assetID for a subnetâ€™s staking asset.

methods.name: platform.getSubnets
methods.summary: Get info about the Subnets.

params.name: ids
params.description: is the subnet whose assetID is requested.

methods.name: platform.getStake
methods.summary: Get the amount of nAVAX staked by a set of addresses. The amount returned does not include staking rewards.

methods.name: platform.getTotalStake
methods.summary: Get the total amount of nAVAX staked on the Primary Network.

methods.name: platform.getTx
methods.summary: Gets a transaction by its ID.

methods.name: platform.getTxStatus
methods.summary: Gets a transactionâ€™s status by its ID. If the transaction was dropped, response will include a reason field with more information why the transaction was dropped.

result.name: getTxStatusResult
result.description:
status is one of:
 Validating: The blockchain is being validated by this node.
 Created: The blockchain exists but isnâ€™t being validated by this node.
 Preferred: The blockchain was proposed to be created and is likely to be created but the transaction isnâ€™t yet accepted.
 Unknown: The blockchain either wasnâ€™t proposed or the proposal to create it isnâ€™t preferred. The proposal may be resubmitted.

methods.name: platform.getUTXOs
methods.summary: Gets the UTXOs that reference a given set of addresses.

params.name: limit
params.description: If startIndex is omitted, will fetch all UTXOs up to limit.

methods.name: platform.issueTx
methods.summary: Issue a transaction to the Platform Chain.

methods.name: platform.sampleValidators
methods.summary: Sample validators from the specified Subnet.

params.name: size
params.description: is the number of validators to sample.

params.name: subnetID
params.description: is the Subnet to sampled from. If omitted, defaults to the Primary Network.

result.name: sampleValidatorsResult
result.description: Each element of validators is the ID of a validator.

methods.name: platform.validatedBy
methods.summary: Get the Subnet that validates a given blockchain.

params.name: blockchainID
params.description: is the blockchainâ€™s ID.

result.name: validatedByResult
result.description: is the ID of the Subnet that validates the blockchain.

methods.name: platform.validates
methods.summary: Get the IDs of the blockchains a Subnet validates.

params.name: subnetID
params.description: subnetID is the Subnetâ€™s ID.

result.name: validatesResult
result.description: Each element of blockchainIDs is the ID of a blockchain the Subnet validates.

methods.name: info.getBlockchainID
methods.summary: Given a blockchainâ€™s alias, get its ID.

params.name: alias
params.description: alias X,P or C

methods.name: info.getNetworkID
methods.summary: Get the ID of the network this node is participating in.

methods.name: info.getNetworkName
methods.summary: Get the name of the network this node is participating in.

methods.name: info.getNodeVersion
methods.summary: Get the version of this node.

databaseVersion.description: is the version of the database this node is using

gitCommit.description: is the Git commit that this node was built from

vmVersions.description: is map where each key/value pair is the name of a VM, and the version of that VM this node runs

methods.name: info.isBootstrapped
methods.summary: Check whether a given chain is done bootstrapping

params.name: chain
params.description: chain X, P or C

methods.name: info.peers
methods.summary: Get a description of peer connections.

params.name: nodeIDs
params.description: is an optional parameter to specify what nodeID's descriptions should be returned. If this parameter is left empty, descriptions for all active connections will be returned. If the node is not connected to a specified nodeID, it will be omitted from the response.

methods.name: info.getTxFee
methods.summary: Get the fees of the network.

methods.name: eth_blockNumber
methods.summary: Returns the number of most recent block.

methods.name: eth_call
methods.summary: Executes a new message call (locally) immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

result.name: returnValue
result.description: The return value of the executed contract

methods.name: eth_chainId
methods.summary: Returns the currently configured chain id
methods.description: Returns the currently configured chain id, a value used in replay-protected transaction signing as introduced by [EIP-155](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-155.md).

result.name: chainId
result.description: hex format integer of the current chain id. Defaults are ETC=61, ETH=1, Morden=62.

methods.name: eth_getAssetBalance
methods.summary: Returns balance of first class Avalanche Native Tokens on the C-Chain

params.name: address
params.description: owner of the asset

params.name: blockNumber
params.description: the block number or hash at which to retrieve the balance

params.name: assetID
params.description: id of the asset for which the balance is requested

methods.name: eth_getBalance
methods.summary: Returns AVAX balance of a given or account or contract

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the account or contract

params.name: blockNumber
params.description: A BlockNumber at which to request the balance

methods.name: eth_signTransaction
methods.summary: Signs a transaction that can be submitted to the network at a later time using with eth_sendRawTransaction.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionCount
methods.summary: Returns the number of transactions sent from an address

methods.name: eth_sendRawTransaction
methods.summary: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation for signed transactions.

params.name: signedTransactionData
params.description: The signed transaction data

result.name: transactionHash
result.description: The transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available.

methods.name: eth_getBlockByHash
methods.summary: Gets a block for a given hash

params.name: includeTransactions
params.description: If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.

methods.name: eth_getBlockByNumber
methods.summary: Gets a block for a given number

params.name: includeTransactions
params.description: If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByHash
methods.summary: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionReceipt
methods.summary: Returns the receipt information of a transaction by its hash.

result.name: transactionReceiptResult
result.description: returns either a receipt or null

methods.name: avax.getAtomicTxStatus
methods.summary: Get the status of an atomic transaction sent to the network.

methods.name: avax.getUTXOs
methods.summary: Gets the UTXOs that reference a given address.

params.name: addresses
params.description: is a list of UTXOs such that each UTXO references at least one address in addresses.

params.name: limit
params.description: At most limit UTXOs are returned. If limit is omitted or greater than 1024, it is set to 1024.

params.name: startIndex
params.description: If startIndex is omitted, will fetch all UTXOs up to limit

methods.name: avax.issueTx
methods.summary: Send a signed transaction to the network. encoding specifies the format of the signed transaction. Can be either "cb58" or "hex". Defaults to "cb58".

methods.name: net_version
methods.summary: Network identifier associated with network
methods.description: Returns the network ID associated with the current network.

result.name: networkId
result.description: Network ID associated with the current network

methods.name: web3_clientVersion
methods.description: Returns the version of the current client
methods.summary: current client version

methods.name: web3_sha3
methods.summary: Hashes data
methods.description: Hashes data using the Keccak-256 algorithm

params.name: data
params.description: data to hash using the Keccak-256 algorithm

result.name: hashedData
result.description: Keccak-256 hash of the given data

ProofNode.title: proofNode
ProofNode.description: An individual node used to prove a path down a merkle-patricia-tree

StorageProofKey.title: storageProofKey
StorageProofKey.description: The key used to get the storage slot in its account tree.

items.title: storageProof
items.description: Object proving a relationship of a storage value to an account's storageHash.

value.title: storageProofValue
value.description: The value of the storage slot in its account tree

ProofNodes.title: proofNodes
ProofNodes.description: The set of node values needed to traverse a patricia merkle tree (from root to leaf) to retrieve a value

SeedHash.title: seedHash
SeedHash.description: The seed hash used for the DAG.

FilterId.title: filterId
FilterId.description: An identifier used to reference the filter.

BlockHash.title: blockHash
BlockHash.description: The hex representation of the Keccak 256 of the RLP encoded block

BlockNumber.title: blockNumber
BlockNumber.description: The hex representation of the block's height

contractAddress.title: ReceiptContractAddress
contractAddress.description: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null

cumulativeGasUsed.title: ReceiptCumulativeGasUsed
cumulativeGasUsed.description: The gas units used by the transaction

gasUsed.title: ReceiptGasUsed
gasUsed.description: The total gas used by the transaction

logs.title: logs
logs.description: An array of all the logs triggered during the transaction

postTransactionState.title: ReceiptPostTransactionState
postTransactionState.description: The intermediate stateRoot directly after transaction execution.

status.title: ReceiptStatus
status.description: Whether or not the transaction threw an error.

BloomFilter.title: bloomFilter
BloomFilter.description: A 2048 bit bloom filter from the logs of the transaction. Each log sets 3 bits though taking the low-order 11 bits of each of the first three pairs of bytes in a Keccak 256 hash of the log's byte series

Log.title: log
Log.description: An indexed event generated during a transaction

data.title: LogData
data.description: The data/input string sent along with the transaction

logIndex.title: LogIndex
logIndex.description: The index of the event within its transaction, null when its pending

removed.title: logIsRemoved
removed.description: Whether or not the log was orphaned off the main chain

Topics.title: LogTopics
Topics.description: Topics are order-dependent. Each topic can also be an array of DATA with 'or' options.

Topic.title: topic
Topic.description: 32 Bytes DATA of indexed log arguments. (In solidity: The first topic is the hash of the signature of the event (e.g. Deposit(address,bytes32,uint256))

TransactionIndex.title: transactionIndex
TransactionIndex.description: The index of the transaction. null when its pending

BlockNumberOrNull.title: blockNumberOrNull
BlockNumberOrNull.description: The block number or null when its the pending block

BlockHashOrNull.title: blockHashOrNull
BlockHashOrNull.description: The block hash or null when its the pending block

NonceOrNull.title: nonceOrNull
NonceOrNull.description: Randomly selected number to satisfy the proof-of-work or null when its the pending block

To.title: To
To.description: Destination address of the transaction. Null if it was a contract create.

Block.title: Block
Block.description: The Block is the collection of relevant pieces of information (known as the block header), together with information corresponding to the comprised transactions, and a set of other block headers that are known to have a parent equal to the present blockâ€™s parentâ€™s parent.

sha3Uncles.title: blockShaUncles
sha3Uncles.description: Keccak hash of the uncles data in the block

logsBloom.title: blockLogsBloom
logsBloom.description: The bloom filter for the logs of the block or null when its the pending block

transactionsRoot.title: blockTransactionsRoot
transactionsRoot.description: The root of the transactions trie of the block.

stateRoot.title: blockStateRoot
stateRoot.description: The root of the final state trie of the block

receiptsRoot.title: blockReceiptsRoot
receiptsRoot.description: The root of the receipts trie of the block

difficulty.title: blockDifficulty
difficulty.description: Integer of the difficulty for this block

totalDifficulty.title: blockTotalDifficulty
totalDifficulty.description: Integer of the total difficulty of the chain until this block

extraData.title: blockExtraData
extraData.description: The 'extra data' field of this block

size.title: blockSize
size.description: Integer the size of this block in bytes

gasLimit.title: blockGasLimit
gasLimit.description: The maximum gas allowed in this block

gasUsed.title: blockGasUsed
gasUsed.description: The total used gas by all transactions in this block

timestamp.title: blockTimeStamp
timestamp.description: The unix timestamp for when the block was collated

transactions.title: transactionsOrHashes
transactions.description: Array of transaction objects, or 32 Bytes transaction hashes depending on the last given parameter

items.title: uncleHash
items.description: Block hash of the RLP encoding of an uncle block

gas.title: transactionGas
gas.description: The gas limit provided by the sender in Wei

gasPrice.title: transactionGasPrice
gasPrice.description: The gas price willing to be paid by the sender in Wei

value.title: transactionValue
value.description: Value of Ether being transferred in Wei

gas.title: transactionGas
gas.description: The gas limit provided by the sender in Wei

gasPrice.title: transactionGasPrice
gasPrice.description: The gas price willing to be paid by the sender in Wei

input.title: transactionInput
input.description: The data field sent with the transaction

nonce.title: transactionNonce
nonce.description: The total number of prior transactions made by the sender

value.title: transactionValue
value.description: Value of Ether being transferred in Wei

TransactionHash.title: transactionHash
TransactionHash.description: Keccak 256 Hash of the RLP encoding of a transaction

Keccak.title: keccak
Keccak.description: Hex representation of a Keccak 256 hash

Nonce.title: nonce
Nonce.description: A number only to be used once

StartTime.description: is the Unix time when the validator starts validating the Subnet.

EndTime.description: is the Unix time when the validator stops validating the Subnet.

StakeAmount.description: is the amount of nAVAX this validator staked. Omitted if subnetID is not the Primary Network

Encoding.name: encoding
Encoding.description: specifies the format for the returned UTXOs. Can be either "cb58" or "hex" and defaults to "cb58".

XAddresses.title: addresses
XAddresses.description: List of contract addresses from which to monitor events

PAddresses.title: addresses
PAddresses.description: List of contract addresses from which to monitor events

Addresses.title: addresses
Addresses.description: List of contract addresses from which to monitor events

Position.title: position
Position.description: Hex representation of the storage slot where the variable exists

DataWord.title: dataWord
DataWord.description: Hex representation of a 256 bit unit of data

Bytes.title: bytes
Bytes.description: Hex representation of a variable length byte array

schema.title: signatureBytes
schema.description: Hex representation of byte array between 2 and 65 chars long

schema.title: gasPriceResult
schema.description: Integer of the current gas price

UncleCountResult.name: uncleCountResult
UncleCountResult.description: The Number of total uncles in the given block

schema.title: filter
schema.description: A filter used to monitor the blockchain for log/events

Logs.name: logs
Logs.description: An array of all logs matching filter with given id.
